titleStmt.title: Colonell Fiennes his reply to a pamphlet entitvled, An answer to Colonell Nathaniel Fiennes relation concerning his surrender of the city and castle of Bristol by Clem. Walker which said answer is here reprinted verbatim. Ordered to be printed.
titleStmt.author: Fiennes, Nathaniel, 1607 or 8-1669.
Walker, Clement, 1595-1651.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
